scripts.build:web: rm -rf dist-android && mkdir -p dist-android && cp src/index.html src/privacy.html src/style.css src/app.js src/manifest.json src/robots.txt src/sitemap.xml dist-android/ && cp -r src/data src/img src/assets dist-android/
scripts.sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync
scripts.android:build: node scripts/bump_version.js && npm run sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug bundleRelease
